title: Kasher in the Rye
html:
Kasher in the Rye

#oakland #comedy

Metadata

  • Author: Moshe Kasher

  • ASIN: B004RCNGSA

  • ISBN: 0446584266

  • Reference: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B004RCNGSA

  • Kindle link

Highlights

There was a cobbler in Rockridge named Alonzo, who took all of these oddballs under his wing and had their VA checks diverted to his little storefront. Then he would pay them piecemeal, either in cash after taking a percentage for himself, or in cocaine that he stuffed into a shoe and passed to them, like a Brothers Grimm tale gone grimmer. Alonzo was a crooked cobbler. That’s life in Oakland. — location: 3228 ^ref-27118
